parameters.content:
# 📰 AI NEWS DAILY DIGEST

**Automated AI News to Gmail**

✅ Fetches from 4 RSS sources
✅ Filters last 24 hours only
✅ AI summarizes top stories
✅ Beautiful HTML email
✅ Sent daily at 8 AM

**Sources:**
• Google News AI
• TechCrunch AI
• The Verge AI
• Hacker News AI

**AI:** GPT-4o-mini for summaries

# ⏰ STEP 1: TRIGGER

**Schedule:** Daily at 8:00 AM

Runs automatically every morning
to fetch fresh AI news

**Timezone:** Asia/Kolkata (IST)

Change `triggerAtHour` to adjust time

# 📡 STEP 2: RSS FEEDS

**4 News Sources:**

1. **Google News** - AI search
2. **TechCrunch** - AI tag
3. **The Verge** - AI section
4. **Hacker News** - AI/LLM/GPT

Feeds are merged using
chained merge nodes
(2 inputs each)

# 🕐 STEP 3: FILTER

**Code Node Logic:**

• Keeps only last 24 hours
• Removes duplicate titles
• Sorts by newest first
• Limits to top 10 articles

```
HOURS = 24
cutoff = now - 24h
```

# 🤖 STEP 4: AI SUMMARY

**GPT-4o-mini** creates:

• 2-line summary per article
• Key insight extraction
• Why it matters

Makes news scannable
and easy to read quickly

**Temperature:** 0.3 (focused)

# 📧 STEP 5: EMAIL

**Gmail sends:**

• Beautiful HTML format
• Gradient header
• Article cards
• Source + timestamp
• Click to read full

**Subject:**
🤖 AI News Digest - [Date]

# 🔧 SETUP REQUIRED

**1. Gmail OAuth**
Connect Google account
with Gmail scope

**2. OpenAI API Key**
For article summaries

**3. Your Email**
Replace in Send Gmail node:
`YOUR_EMAIL@gmail.com`

**4. Activate Workflow**
Toggle ON when ready

# 📊 COMPLETE FLOW

```
Daily 8 AM
    ↓
┌───┴───┬───┬───┐
↓   ↓   ↓   ↓
RSS RSS RSS RSS
↓   ↓   ↓   ↓
└─┬─┘   └─┬─┘
  ↓       ↓
Merge   Merge
  └───┬───┘
      ↓
  Merge All
      ↓
 Filter 24h
      ↓
  Limit 10
      ↓
 Has News?
   ↓ Yes
 Extract Data
      ↓
AI Summarize
      ↓
 Combine All
      ↓
Build HTML
      ↓
Send Gmail ✉️
```

# 🔗 RSS FEED URLS

**Google News:**
`news.google.com/rss/search?q=AI`

**TechCrunch:**
`techcrunch.com/.../feed/`

**The Verge:**
`theverge.com/rss/ai.../index.xml`

**Hacker News:**
`hnrss.org/newest?q=AI+OR+LLM`

Add more feeds by duplicating
RSS nodes and merging

Will try again tomorrow at 8 AM!
